fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.manager

Interface GlobalDeviceManager


  • public interface GlobalDeviceManager
    Internal device manager which can be used only by technical services. Applications do not have access to this service.
    Author:
    Thomas leveque

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DependRegistration addDependencies(DeviceDependencies dependencies, Application app)
      Adds the specified device dependency.
      List<ApplicationDevice> getApplicationDevices(Application app)
      Returns all device proxy visible for specified application.
      List<AvailableDevice> getAvailableDevices()
      Returns all available devices.
      List<ApplicationDevice> getDeviceDescriptions(DeviceRequest request, Application app)
      Returns all device proxy visible for specified application which match the request.
      List<KnownDevice> getKnownDevices()
      Returns all device known by the device manager.
      ApplicationDevice getUnProtectedApplicationDevice(ApplicationDevice dev)
      Returns internal representation of specified device which is not protected.

    • Method Detail

      • getDeviceDescriptions

        List<ApplicationDevice> getDeviceDescriptions(DeviceRequest request,
                                            Application app)
        Returns all device proxy visible for specified application which match the request. If application is null, returns all device proxy visible from at least one application. Returned proxies may inherit from ApplicationDevice if application is allowed to get them.
        Parameters:
        app - an application
        request - represents a filter to apply on results
        Returns:
        all device proxy visible for specified application which match the request.

      • addDependencies

        DependRegistration addDependencies(DeviceDependencies dependencies,
                                 Application app)
        Adds the specified device dependency.
        Parameters:
        dependencies - a device dependency
        app - the application which adds this dependency
        Returns:
        a handle on this dependency registration

      • getAvailableDevices

        List<AvailableDevice> getAvailableDevices()
        Returns all available devices.
        Returns:
        all available devices.

      • getKnownDevices

        List<KnownDevice> getKnownDevices()
        Returns all device known by the device manager. Corresponding device may not be available or either used by any application.
        Returns:
        all device known by the device manager.

      • getApplicationDevices

        List<ApplicationDevice> getApplicationDevices(Application app)
        Returns all device proxy visible for specified application. If application is null, returns all device proxy visible from at least one application.
        Parameters:
        app - an application
        Returns:
        all device proxy visible for specified application.

      • getUnProtectedApplicationDevice

        ApplicationDevice getUnProtectedApplicationDevice(ApplicationDevice dev)
        Returns internal representation of specified device which is not protected. Dev parameter must not be null.
        Parameters:
        dev - a device proxy used by an application.
        Returns:
        internal representation of specified device which is not protected.
